question: A scientist wants to produce virus-free plant in tissue culture. Which part of the plant will he use as an explant?
(a) Mature stem, (b) Axillary meristem, (c) Apical meristem, (d) Mesophyll cells
explanation: The meristem (apical and axillary) is free of virus and is used to produce virus-free plants [cite: 217-229, 476].
